transactions

This module exposes functions related to the /transactions path.

Source:
  • resources/transactions.js, line 1

Methods

(inner) calculateInstallmentsAmount(opts) → {Promise}

GET /transactions/calculate_installments_amount Calculates the value of each purchase's installments

Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Description
opts Object

An options params which is usually already bound by connect functions.
body.interest_rate Number

The interest rate's value.
body.amount Number

The value of the purchase.
body.max_installments Number <optional>

The max number of installments.
body.free_installments Number <optional>

The number of installments without interest.
Source:
  • resources/transactions.js, line 173
Returns:

Resolves to the result of the request or to an error.

Type
Promise

(inner) find(opts, body)

GET /transactions Makes a request to /transactions or to /transactions/:id

Parameters:
Name Type Description
opts Object

An options params which is usually already bound by connect functions.
body Object

The payload for the request. API Reference for this payload

Properties
Name Type Attributes Description
id Number <optional>

The transaction ID. If not sent a transaction list will be returned instead.
count Number <optional>

Pagination option for transaction list. Number of transaction in a page
page Number <optional>

Pagination option for transaction list. The page index.
Source:
  • resources/transactions.js, line 40
